metadata.description: Information about Oxycodone including basics, effects, dosage, history, legal status, photos, research, media coverage, and links to other resources.

content:
Drug: Oxycodone | cid: 5284603
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Oxycodone including basics, effects, dosage, history, legal status, photos, research, media coverage, and links to other resources.
Erowid name: oxycodone
Category: PHARMS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    This reusable "Ecobag" is made of 100% recycled mid-weight (10 oz) cotton canvas, printed with the Erowid logo.

Donate now and receive yours!

Oxycodone



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Percocet (w/acetaminophen/paracetamol); Percodan (w/aspirin); Oxycontin (time-release); Roxicodone; OxyNorm

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Analgesic

CHEMICAL NAME

(5a)-4,5-epoxy-14-hydroxy-3-methoxy-17- methylmorphinan-6-one

DESCRIPTION

Oxycodone is an semi-synthetic opioid analgesic, used primarily in the treatment of pain. It saw a significant increase in recreational use when the higher-dose time-release form OxyContin was introduced in 1995. In 2005, Jakubska et al. published a finding that oxycodone is produced naturally by the shrub Epipactis helleborine.

CAUTION

Oxycodone preparations may contain analgesics such as acetaminophen, which can be toxic to the liver in high doses.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

GENERAL INFORMATION #

Oxycodone Bits & Pieces

Oxycodone & Drug Tests


                    Context: 
                    This section appears on Erowid's oxycodone information page, directly following a brief promotional note about an Erowid-branded Ecobag. It introduces oxycodone, listing its common and brand names (such as Percocet and OxyContin), effects classification, chemical name, a description covering its medical and recreational use, and a safety caution about acetaminophen toxicity. It also links to related oxycodone resources, effects, health information, law, dosage, and chemistry sections.
